category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_Copy_Variability_For_SaveAs
preference.preference_description: Determines whether variability is copied to a new item when performing a Save As action on an item. When the value of this preference is set to TRUE, Teamcenter checks if the original item is designated as a Product item (RDV-specific). If it is, the variability is copied to the new item. If it is not, variability is not copied.An item is defined as a Product item using the following preferences: PortalDesignContextProductItemProperties PortalDesignContextProductItemProperties.object_type PortalDesignContextProductItemProperties.object_desc Valid Values: TRUE - Variability is copied to the new item when performing a Save As action. FALSE - Variability is not copied to the new item when performing a Save As action.
